TBH it may be faster to just install WSL. That's what I use when I'm on Windows.

Thatâ€™s the only way Iâ€™ve ever been able to do any dev other than .net on a windows machine. 

My PC is currently at fed ex and being shipped out. I wish I was able to test this out

I use `hs-cms-dev-server .` or `hs theme preview <foldername> .` , but I did just try `hs theme preview .` with the same result.

I've never had major issues with discrepancies of Mac vs Windows until this.  Literally everything else with the package seems to work fine haha.

`WSL` = *`Windows Subsystem for Linux`*

I didnâ€™t know this but wanted to make sure everyone knows.
Yah I think I got wsl setup in under 2 hours and that included me having to learn how to do it
